name: Jeela Scoria Harik

abilities.name: Force power: Harm
abilities.description: May make a Harm Force power check against one Engaged target. Spend :forcepip: to inflict a number of Wounds equal to Intellect on the target, ignoring Soak. Spend :forcepip: to increase wounds inflicted by Intellect (may activate this multiple times), and spend :forcepip: to heal wounds equal to wounds inflicted on self or an Engaged ally. May spend :forcepip: to increase the range of the power by one range band (may activate multiple times) and may spend :forcepip: to increase the number of enemies affected by one (may activate multiple times).

gear: Superior Jedi temple guard armour (+2 Soak, +2 Defence, remove :setback: from darkness or similar environmental effects, built-in comlink)

name: Vinon Scorne

abilities.name: Force power: Seek
abilities.description: :forcepip::forcepip:: Gain insight into the general location or direction of a person or object; :forcepip:: Succeed at an :average: Vigilance check to see through illusions.

gear: Ancient Jedi battle armour (+2 Soak, +1 Defence)

abilities.name: Force power: Sense
abilities.description: :forcepip:: Sense all living beings within Short range; :forcepip:: Sense the emotional state of one living target at Engaged range.

name: Biala Vale
gear: Survival gear (add :boost: to all Survival checks)

name: Echiella

abilities.name: Force power: Influence
abilities.description: :forcepip:: inflict 2 Strain on target in Short range (may activate multiple times); :forcepip:: succeed at an opposed Discipline vs. Discipline check to force one target within Short range to adopt an emotional state, or believe something even if it is untrue, for one round or five minutes; spend :forcepip: to increase the duration by two rounds or ten minutes.

abilities.name: Force power: Misdirect
abilities.description: :forcepip:: make a target up to Short range unable to percieve a chosen person or object of Silhoutte 1 or smaller, or change the appearance of an object or person; :forcepip: to affect additional targets equal to Presence; commit :force::force: to sustain this power while the beguiled targets are in range.

gear: Ancient Jedi battle armour (+2 Soak, +1 Defence)

abilities.name: Rakghoul Disease
abilities.description: If a :triumph: is rolled on any attack against a humanoid, the target must make a Resilience check ( :difficulty::difficulty::challenge: ). Failure means the target is infected and will begin feeling the effects of the virus in one hour.

abilities.name: Rakghoul Disease
abilities.description: If a :triumph: is rolled on any attack against a humanoid, the target must make a Resilience check ( :difficulty::difficulty::challenge: ). Failure means the target is infected and will begin feeling the effects of the virus in one hour.

name: Brossk K’yyl
description: Brossk is an older Bothan man, whose golden fur has grayed around his muzzle. His manner is suave but not insincere. Brossk is both charming and deceptive. Depending upon his reading of people, he uses a variety of means to gain cooperation or aid. Unlike some, he isn’t stingy with pay if that is what motivates an asset he is recruiting. Emotional appeals–or even outright emotional blackmail–are another of his go-to recruiting techniques, especially with people he is close to. (Brossk’s granddaughter, the Archaeologist Priska K’yyl, has the Family Obligation to him for just this reason.) Brossk will also offer other inducements (either direct action or through one of his contacts) such as extremely favorable loan terms; to “disappear” a criminal charge, fine, or civil judgement; or new ship transponder code (Debt or similar Obligation).
gear: Banal Apparel (Opposing characters upgrade the difficulty of any checks made to identify the wearer once)
Second Skin Armor (+1 Soak/+1 Defense; +2 Setback to Perception checks to notice on the wearer)

name: Priska K’yyl
description: Adventurous Archaeologist. Bothan. Explorer career, Archeologist spec. Obligation: Family. Priska’s doting grandfather is a spymaster who often wheedles her into running “little errands” for him. (+5 level) Motivation: Status. Academic prestige for finding proof of a despotic pre-Republic empire.

name: Fyrnock
description: Fyrnocks are dangerous predators found on large asteroids with breathable atmospheres, and possibly other locations–but the less sunlight, the better. Xenobiologists disagree on whether fyrnocks have a deep-rooted terror of natural light, or if it damages them. Whatever the evolutionary reason, fyrnocks cannot be forced by any means, not even the Force, to enter natural sunlight. Unlike most lifeforms, they are silicone-based, not carbon-based. Fyrnocks live in large packs, which may include a much larger and stronger Mother Fyrnock.
abilities: Creature of the Dark – Fyrnock cannot abide natural sunlight–but can other types of light–and will refuse to enter it

abilities.name: Creature of the Dark
abilities.description: Fyrnock cannot abide natural sunlight–but can other types of light–and will refuse to enter it.

name: Sith Juggernaut
notes: Credits go to Chris Hunt, D2Radio.com

talents.name: Defensive Training 1
talents.description: Lightsaber, Melee, and Brawl weapons wielded by a Sith Juggernaut gain 1 rank in the Defensive item quality [replaces any ranks in Defensive the weapon already has].

abilities.name: Additional Combat Turns
abilities.description: Takes one additional turn at the end of the round.

abilities.name: Falling Avalanche
abilities.description: Suffer 2 strain to add damage equal to Brawn to next Lightsaber combat check made this turn.

abilities.name: Force Power: Bind
abilities.description: May spend Force points to immobilize a target within short range until the end of the user’s next turn. If Dark Side points used, the target also suffers 1 wound per Force point spent on the check [ignores soak].

abilities.name: Overpowering Blows
abilities.description: A character who uses the Parry talent against a Sith Juggernaut’s Lightsaber or Melee attacks costs an additional point of strain.

abilities.name: Shatter Defenses
abilities.description: Lightsaber or Melee attacks made by Sith Juggernauts ignore up to 2 points of Melee Defense.

name: Partisan Fighter
description: Whether seen as desperate freedom fighters or vile terrorists, these radical militants are prepared to take the fight to the Empire at any cost. The origin of the Partisans lies with that of the Onderon rebels trained by the Republic and Jedi during the Clone Wars. Few original members remain alive, let alone within the ranks. Regardless of origin, these fighters are fiercely loyal to their leader, Saw Gerrera, and zealously believe in the cause. They are prepared to die, and kill, to end Imperial tyranny. They favour ambushes and other guerrilla type tactics, with a favorite tactics being close range ambush by infiltration of the civilian population. That these attacks put local civilians at risk is a minor concern to the Partisans when compared to the titanic abuses of the Empire.
notes: Credits go to Chris Hunt, D2Radio.com

abilities.name: Hide Among the People
abilities.description: When concealing themselves among local civilians, Partisan Fighters upgrade Stealth checks once.

abilities.name: For the Cause
abilities.description: As an Action, one minion sacrifices himself to guarantee a successful attack. Roll an attack as if made by a single minion and resolve as normal, except the attack will be considered a hit even if there are no uncancelled :success: results. If no uncancelled :success: remains, the attack deals the base damage only but :advantage: and :triumph: may be spent normally.
